text: فطاف عليها طائف من ربك وهم نائمون

translations.translation: So a visitation from your Lord came upon it while they slept
Then a calamity from your Lord fell upon it, but they remained fast asleep.
Thereupon a calamity from your Lord passed over it while they were asleep,
A visitor from your Lord circled around the garden during the night while they were asleep
So an envoy from your Lord completed his round upon the garden, whilst they were sleeping.
Then there passed over it a Ta'if from your Lord while they were asleep.
Then there encompassed it a visitation from your Lord while they were sleeping.
Then a visitation from thy Lord visited it, while they were sleeping,
Then a visitation from thy Lord came upon it while they slept
A calamity from your Lord befell the orchard as they slept.
Wherefore an encircling visitation visited it even as they slept on.
Then, a visitation from your Lord visited it while they were asleep.
Then there came on the (garden) a visitation from thy Lord, (which swept away) all around, while they were asleep.
Then there passed by on the (garden) something (fire) from your Lord at night and burnt it while they were asleep.
Then, a visitation from your Lord came down upon it while they slept,
But a calamity from your Lord went around it while they slept.
So there came upon the garden an affliction from your Lord while they were asleep.
[68:19] Then a visitation from your Lord visited it, [that is] a fire consumed it during the night, while they slept.
(Then a visitation) a punishment from your Lord (came upon it) upon the garden (while they slept) and was burned.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
ولم يفوضوا أمرهم إلى مشيئة الله { فَطَافَ عَلَيْهَا } أي: على الجنة { طَآئِفٌ } بلا مخصوص بها أحاط جميع جوانبها
 لا لما في حواليها من البساتين الأخرى
 ناشئة { مِّن رَّبِّكَ } يا أكمل الرسل { وَهُمْ } حينئذٍ { نَآئِمُونَ } [القلم: 19] في بيوتهم

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ فطاف عليها } أي: على الجنة { طائف من ربك } أي: نزل عليها بلاء من جهته تعالى
 قيل: أنزل الله عليها ناراً فأحرقتها
 وقيل: طاف بها جبريل
 لأنه الموكل بالخسف
 فاقتلعها
 وطاف بها حول البيت
 ثم وضعها بالطائف
 وليس بمكة وما قرب منها بستان غيرها
 وهي مدينة الطائف
 انظر اللباب
 { وهم نائمون } أي: في حال نومهم
 أو: غافلون عما جرت به المقادير
